Name: Lavinia Good Food

Review Text: Cool place with really nice food! High quality! The banana pancakes were absolutely aaaaaaamazing! ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Really good scrambled eggs and salmon. Staff were really friendly. Coffee was a bit not to my taste but it didn't ruin anything!

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Good food but nothing extraordinary. I liked the pumpkin toast. Prices a bit high, but it's Amsterdam and they make no sense almost anywhere.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Small & lovely Caf√© with delicious food and vegan / gluten free options.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Small cafe close to the center with a great variety of coffee specialties, cakes and breakfast options! The service is really nice - we did have some waiting time for the food, but the wait was totally worth it. Can recommend for a chill brunch, a healthy breakfast or a coffee with friends! ‚òïÔ∏è

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Food was nicely presented and the atmosphere was very nice. Food was okay. However; I do not regularly eat at "Health Food Restaurants" so my opinion on the food is from an outsider perspective. I thought the pancakes were hard and slightly dry. Service could have been better also.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Have gluten free sandwiches and cakes. Food is fine, but portions are small. Very crowded - the tables are very close to each other and there are too many of them, so when all people are talking it‚Äôs so loud as if in a bar, so you cannot hear anything.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: This cafe was a highlight of my Amsterdam trip, an absolute gem hidden in the backstreets away from the tourist and commercial attractions. With delicious and inspiring food to please all I was gobsmacked at the flavours and the beauty of ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavinia Good Food

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Very nice cafe with great vegan and vegetarian food options. Nice staff, nice decor and yummy food. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: This is an out of the way find. There is a laid back vibe(so don‚Äôt expect instant/fast food service). I‚Äôm not personally a vegetarian but my lunch was amazing. Highly recommended.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Really good brunch, the duck breast pizzetta was so good we had to order another one. Also they serve delicious Bocca coffee. Yummy!

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Great Food and atmosphere. Amazing place for lunch or breakfast. Only gave four stars because it was a little too busy (took some time before we got the food)

Review Text: Not bad food but the staff didn't tend to tables promptly, didn't remember which table ordered what and also didn't check anyone for vaccinations upon entry asthey are obliged to

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text:

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: I was excited to try this address as I read good reviews about their vegan options. When I got there I was disappointed to see that there were only 2 vegan options left on the menu (my guess is that they shortened the menu post-covid?) : ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavinia Good Food

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Happy healthy lunch place! Fantastic kitchen in the city center! Great Avo on toast and delicious pizza's. The Pumpkin and red onions will blow your mind!

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: best breakfast/lunch spot we visited in amsterdam! loved my breakfast pizza + matcha latte. & my boyfriend loved his eggs + toast & cappuccino! flavors were amazing, super fresh ingredients.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Good portions and very tasty food! I had the Teriyaki bowl and my friend the avocado toast. Perfect for a veggie and healthy lunch.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: The choice of food is varied. Portions are good. Polite staff.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text:
The Food is really tasty and is all vegetarian with a lot of vegan options
The Portion size is good for the Price
We had the bowl with 3 ingredients

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Worst lunch I ever had. Soup tasted like dirty sour water, salad was bland and made almost only of chickpeas. Veggie meatballs were gross. Service was unwelcoming and unpleasant. Ran away  after paying and leaving most of my food there. Never coming back here again.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Really bad, bad, bad place. Terrible service. Low quality food. Overpriced. Wrong bill even. Probably worst cafe I‚Äôve ever been at

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Seriously good tasty food. A variety  of lactose free options. Definitely worth a visit

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: We were randomly recommended to visit this place and happy we did. Great service great breakfast and awesome coffee. Place is cozy and nice as well. Recommend a visit if you're nearby.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Really cosy place, nicely decorated, a little hip, serving organic food : spelt pizza, lentil soup, salad buffet, banana bread...The kitchen is semi-open. Perfect for lunch or a little meeting. Free wifi and no cash.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text:
Super friendly staff, today's salad is fresh and tasty and not crazy expensive. Chill crowd, either meeting with friends or taking advantage of the wifi to work or read. Everything looks super fresh - therefore not too many items on the menu.
Recommended!

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: All around great place to eat at, from the interior to the food and service. If your looking for something a little different than your ordinary lunchroom, check these guy out.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Tiny restaurant. Filled with locals. NO tourists. A must visit on your trip. Really good food.

Name: Lavinia Good Food

Name: Lavinia Good Food

Name: Lavinia Good Food

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: This might be the best restaurant/cafe we've seen. It's so quaint and the food is ridiculous. Healthy and fresh and well done.  Friendly staff and gluten free options. Breakfast and lunch all day. Healthy sweets! Not sure how some reviewer ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Go-to place for my vegetarian brunch. Fantastic eggs with vegan portobello "bacon" not to be missed. How they can make a simple thing seem luxurious, I have no idea. Avo total with poached eggs is another favorite. Try the carrot ginger juice. I branched out to their bowls, which are also original, fulfilling, yummy.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: It is nice but there is not much choice in the menu

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Nice waiter service and tasty food. Enjoyed the place

Name: Lavinia Good Food

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Food is yummy, like most healthy-organic eateries, Lavinia changes its menu on a daily basis. The choice is interesting, ranging from salad to fruity-muesli bowl. Lots of healthy options there at a reasonable price, plus the waitresses were friendly, which doesn't hurt ;)

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Nice healthy food in a comfy setting. Lots of gluten-free and vegan options. The toast with toppings are nice - avocado and egg is a great option. The Lavinia breakfast has a mini smoothie bowl and the banana pancakes. Pancakes are nice but ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Great vibe however food underwhelming. My sister and I both got a raw food bar and pancakes they were good don't get me wrong but not the stack of pancakes I was expecting. If I was a vegan visiting Amsterdam it would not be on my must go-tos.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Lovely rustic caf√©; a great spot to dine alone or meet friends for coffee or a working lunch. Too many healthy options to choose from, so the lunch platter is a nice option - soup, avocado toast and your choice of veggie salad. Looking forward to going again on my next trip to Amsterdam!

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Friendly staff and a decoration that makes you feel like home. Special mention to the mister who is really attentive to the well-being of the customers. Another mention to the well balanced vegan egg salad sandwich.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Foods looks nice, cosy atmosphere and mid-range prices. Small but cosy.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: 2 words: veggie bacon.   Do you know what it is? Apparently it is sliced mushrooms and it is also something you can order with your sandwich at Lavinia.   In fact, you won't be able to find normal bacon here or moat any other meat here.  So it's only good food if you love veggies.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: A beautifully decorated healthy food oasis in Amsterdam. The smoothie bowl was wonderful as well as the orange (carrot, apple, ginger) juice. My boyfriend had the avocado toast with salmon and it was amazing. Definitely a great stop for some healthy food!

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Had lunch here recently whilst in Amsterdam. Ridiculously under-staffed. Ordered an overpriced ‚Äòveggie bacon‚Äô (portobello mushrooms fried in a pan...). The manager was disorganised and really seemed to primarily care about profit over creating an experience for diners. Definitely a tourist trap.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
Review Text: Very friendly staff, multiple vegan options, nice atmosphere

Name: Lavinia Good Food

Review Text: If you have allergies, vegan or gluten intolerant, this is a great place as their menu really caters to those needs. Otherwise, it is an ok cafe with decent food, great ambiance and very slow service.

Name: Lavinia Good Food
